EmailTemplate.subject: Win 2 OpenStack Summit Passes Tomorrow!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-openstack-summit-sweepstakes?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=openstack-summit-sweeps&utm_content=05052015> Hi {{Lead.First Name}},
Don't miss out on your chance to win two passes to the OpenStack Summit in Vancouver! join attendees of all levels who will learn about OpenStack through keynotes, speaking sessions, hands-on labs, and OpenStackâ€™s ecosystem marketplace. What better way to join the open source discussion? <http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-openstack-summit-sweepstakes?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=openstack-summit-sweeps&utm_content=05052015>

-The VMTurbo Team
